title: Virginia: Will It Flip Red? | Guests: Jim Jordan & Rand Paul | 11/2/21
description:
The governor election in Virginia is finally here. Glenn and Stu go over the tactics both candidates have used to get elected. Glenn and Stu go into more detail on the radical agenda proposals discussed at the Glasgow climate summit. Rep. Jim Jordan, author of “Do What You Said You Would Do,” joins to discuss Americans waking up to government control and how they're fighting back. Glenn describes “The Joe Rogan Effect” currently happening in politics, where people are realizing the political line they refuse to cross. Missouri Attorney General Eric Schmitt joins Glenn to discuss President Biden’s vaccine and immigration mandates. Sen. Rand Paul joins to discuss the upcoming Senate hearing with Dr. Fauci.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
